name: The Thackleton Traveler
description:
During a drunken night out Riley and Elaine disturb an ancient magical artifact, and find themselves trapped in another world. Now they must contend with a myriad of fantastical trials and tribulations before they can return home, ideally with their humanity intact.

For more details and discussion thread see: https://tfgames.site/index.php?module=viewgame&id=2870

Music credits: https://pastebin.com/8FrmB2cf

If you would like to find out about the next game I release several years from now, feel free to follow me on twitter: https://twitter.com/charlsebob1
